mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, user_id, duration, fee, way, unit_period_key, visitor_id, counselor_id, biz_date, status, extra, create_time, update_time FROM order_base WHERE user_id = #{userId} and unit_period_key > #{cursor} and status = 2 order by unit_period_key limit #{count}

SELECT id, order_id, user_id, duration, fee, way, unit_period_key, visitor_id, counselor_id, biz_date, status, extra, create_time, update_time FROM order_base WHERE counselor_id = #{counselorId} and status = 2 and unit_period_key = #{unitPeriodKey}

SELECT id, order_id, user_id, duration, fee, way, unit_period_key, visitor_id, counselor_id, biz_date, status, extra, create_time, update_time FROM order_base WHERE counselor_id = #{counselorId} and status = 2 and biz_date >= #{startTime} and order_base.biz_date <= #{endTime}
SELECT id, order_id, user_id, duration, fee, way, unit_period_key, visitor_id, counselor_id, biz_date, status, extra, create_time, update_time FROM order_base WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_base (order_id, user_id, duration, fee, way, unit_period_key, visitor_id, counselor_id, biz_date, status, extra) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{duration}, #{fee}, #{way}, #{unitPeriodKey}, #{visitorId}, #{counselorId}, #{bizDate}, #{status}, #{extra})
mapper.update: UPDATE order_base SET user_id = #{userId}, duration = #{duration}, fee = #{fee}, way = #{way}, unit_period_key = #{unitPeriodKey}, visitor_id = #{visitorId}, counselor_id = #{counselorId}, biz_date = #{bizDate}, status = #{status}, extra = #{extra} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
UPDATE order_base SET status = #{status} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
